description: Try our easy to follow Sausage, Risoni & Tomato Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Zucchini,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Sausage, Risoni & Tomato Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g tin diced tomatoes In tomato juice

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Heat oil in a heatproof casserole over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Cut sausages into 3cm pieces and add to casserole. Cook for 8 minutes or until browned. Pour tomatoes and water into casserole and bring to the boil.

Add risoni and stir until combined. Cover casserole and place in oven. Bake for 20 minutes or until pasta is tender. Stir zucchini and peas into casserole. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle cheese over top of bake and return to oven. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese has melted. Serve.
